page.title: 04THE YOUTH TRAINING SCHEME
page.content: The Y.T.S.is to train young unemployed people who are over sixteen years old. The building that they use as the training centre used to be the old Haxey Primary School until it moved to a new building.Before they used the old school they used Doctor Green's house.There are seven departments in the Youth Training Scheme ; light engineering(this is making things out of metal, mending lawnmowers and tuning motorbikes), painting ( painting the buildings of the training scheme and going outside to decorate people's houses).The horticultural section grow plants and have an orchard and some greenhouses.
